Package com.soen6441.risk_game_u14.controller

Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
com.soen6441.risk_game_u14.controller.GameEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameEngine extends Object implements Serializable
The GameEngine Class Controls the Phases of Game
  • There are 3 phases
Author:
Devansh, Meshva, Gowtham
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameEngine()
     
    GameEngine(GameModel p_GameModel)
    This is the main game engine constructor method which is responsible for controlling the map and player controllers and the game and map models in case of assign-counties.

    • listenCommand

      public void listenCommand() throws Exception
      This method is responsible for mapping the inputs from the user interface to the game engine
      Throws:
      Exception - handles the exception at startup phase during assign-countries where the number of players is only one Or, more than the total number of countries

    • saveGame

      public void saveGame(String p_Command)
      This method calls the savegame method of GameModel to save the game during gameplay. Once the game is saved, this method also sets it phase to GameSaved phase.
      Parameters:
      p_Command - command entered by the user
